speaker: alien
welcomeLines: Hey there, superstar! Ready to crush some cravings?
Welcome back! Your brain is getting stronger every time!
I spy a craving crusher! Let's play!
You showed up, and that's already awesome!
Ready for an adventure? Let's go!
encouragement: Your brain is building new trails right now!
victory: You crushed it! The Munchie Monster didn't stand a chance!
Amazing job! Your brain just got even stronger!
You did it! That craving wave crashed and you rode it out!
Superstar! You're a real craving crusher!
timeUp: Nice try! Your brain got stronger just by playing!
The Munchie Monster got away this time, but you'll get it next time!
Great effort! Every try makes you stronger!
You gave it your best, and that's what counts!

monsterIntro.quick: A tiny Munchie Monster appeared! You can handle this!
monsterIntro.standard: A Munchie Monster is here! Time to show it who's boss!
monsterIntro.boss: Whoa! A BOSS Munchie Monster! This is gonna be epic!
